Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute at 130th/Indiana
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, I-94, 130th and Eberhart due to police activity near 130th/Indiana.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include the #2 King Drive bus, #29 State bus, or the 151 Sheridan bus.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
